Content.presentation: Hi, I'm Miguel Angel Hernandez Melo
Content.body1: I'm a frontend developer with over 7 years of experience across a diverse range of projects. Currently coding, mentoring, and having fun at #Globant & #Disney.
Content.body2: Driving frontend innovation with JavaScript, Angular, and React. I craft captivating user experiences that push the boundaries of digital interactions.

globant.achievement1: Led a front-end team to efficiently address and resolve technical requests
globant.achievement2: Designed innovative features, significantly enhancing client satisfaction and product usability
globant.achievement3: Migrated legacy AngularJS applications to Angular and React with TypeScript

epam.achievement1: Proposed innovative approaches, architectures, and dependencies for client applications
epam.achievement2: Developed websites and user interfaces for cruises, restaurants, and hotels
epam.achievement3: Optimized legacy code, ensuring adherence to best coding practices
epam.achievement4: Migrated from jQuery to Vanilla JavaScript and React.js

tcs.achievement1: Designed a frontend application utilizing Angular 2+
tcs.achievement2: Collaborated with planning and development teams to review application features
tcs.achievement3: Offered expert technical support for development, installation, and maintenance
tcs.achievement4: Ensured seamless integration of new features with existing systems

freelancer.achievement1: Developed innovative front-end solutions utilizing cutting-edge technologies
freelancer.achievement2: Management of databases to maintain optimum application performance
freelancer.achievement3: Performed unit and integration tests to ensure systems requirements

angularMigration.title: Legacy AngularJS Migration
angularMigration.description: Led migration of multiple legacy AngularJS applications to modern Angular and React with TypeScript, improving performance and maintainability.

hospitalityApps.title: Hospitality Industry Applications
hospitalityApps.description: Developed comprehensive websites and user interfaces for cruise lines, restaurants, and hotels, creating engaging customer experiences.

reactMigration.title: jQuery to React Migration
reactMigration.description: Successfully migrated legacy jQuery applications to modern React.js, implementing component-based architecture and modern development practices.

performanceOptimization.title: Database & Performance Optimization
performanceOptimization.description: Optimized database queries and frontend performance across multiple freelance projects, ensuring optimal application behavior.

engineering.title: Engineering Foundation
engineering.description: Started my career in Hydrocarbon Engineering, developing analytical thinking and problem-solving skills.
engineering.highlight: This technical foundation proved invaluable in software development.

transition.title: Career Transition
transition.description: Made the bold decision to transition into software development, driven by passion for technology and innovation.

current.title: Leadership & Innovation
current.description: Now leading teams and driving technical innovation at Globant, mentoring developers and shaping the future of frontend development.
current.highlight: 6+ years of progressive growth in the industry.

timeline.step1: Hydrocarbon Engineering degree, developing technical foundation
timeline.step2: Started freelance web development, self-taught programming
timeline.step3: Business English certification in Toronto, expanding international perspective
timeline.step4: Professional software development at TCS, EPAM, building expertise
timeline.step5: Team lead at Globant, mentoring and driving innovation

About.philosophy: Knowing your own ignorance is the first step to enlightenment.

teamLead.title: Team Leadership
teamLead.description: Leading frontend teams at Globant, coordinating technical decisions and ensuring project delivery excellence.

innovation.description: Designing innovative features and proposing cutting-edge architectures that enhance client satisfaction and product usability.

architecture.title: Architecture Design
architecture.description: Defining technical architectures and development approaches for complex client applications across multiple industries.

mentoring.title: Mentoring & Growth
mentoring.description: Mentoring junior developers and fostering team growth through knowledge sharing and best practices implementation.

uniqueBackground.title: Unique Engineering Background
uniqueBackground.description: My foundation in Hydrocarbon Engineering provides a unique perspective in software development, combining analytical thinking with technical innovation. This diverse background enables me to approach complex problems with both engineering precision and creative solutions.
